colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(GANG LTAR YANG LNGA MA'I YI GE LTAR BYAS TE, MCHOG GSUM SPYI LA MCHOD PA'I SGO NAS RLUNG RTA DAR BAR BYED PA'I CHO GA 'DI NI CHEN PO HOR YUL GYI GRVA RIGS, ,BLO BZANG LUNG RTOGS DANG BLO BZANG RNAM RGYAL GNYIS KYIS RLUNG RTA'I BSKANG BSHAGS CIG GYIS CES DNGOS PO'I SKYES DANG BCAS YANG NAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I MOL NGOR, ^BTZUN GZUGS NGAG DBANG THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSOS RANG LO NYER BRGYAD LA 'BABS PA'I NAG ZLA'I YAR TSES BZANG POR CHOS SDE CHEN PO BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI RANG BZHAG NAS GA-YNG KHRAL TZAM DU BRIS PA'I YI GE PA NI DPYAD LDAN DGE SLONG BSAM 'GRUB MING CAN GYIS BGYIS PA,, MANGGA LAm,,)
